Dates of Chinese New Year, Indian Diwali and Easter

easter.Rd

Dates of Chinese New Year, Indian Diwali and Easter, suitable for the use in [seas_we()].

Format

Objects of class `"Date"`.

Source

http://www.census.gov/srd/www/genhol/genhol_downloads.html

http://www.chinesenewyears.info/chinese-new-year-calendar.php

Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation

Examples


cny
